artist: Painter: After Claude-Joseph Vernet; Etcher: Jean Desaulx; Engraver: Claude Niquet
description: river landscape; fisherman at left talking to a woman with a basket on her head; three men in a small boat on river hauling in a net with fish; tower center distance; cliffs on either bank
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: No. 565  VERNET  Eco\'le Franc\'se / Dese par Bernard  Gravé a l\'Eau-forte par De Saulx  Termine par Niquet / PAYSAGE | on sheet in pencil: 543
title: Paysage
